subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
Newspapers
News and News Media
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Bud Selig dispatched two of his top advisers to Miami to ask the editor of a weekly newspaper to share documents that reportedly link a number of player to performance enhancers.
snippet: Commissioner Bud Selig dispatched two of his top advisers to Miami to ask the editor of a weekly newspaper to share documents that reportedly link a number of player to performance enhancers.
